  • Class Description
    Canvas  
    complex_function
    This interface represents a complex function of type y=g(f1(x), f2(x)), where both f1, f2 are functions (or complex functions), y and x are real numbers and g is an operation: plus, mul, div, max, min, comp (f1(f2(x))).
    ComplexFunction  
    ComplexFunctionBoazTest  
    ComplexFunctionTest  
    cont_function
    The interface represents a continuance function
    edutest  
    ex1test  
    function
    This interface represents a simple function of type y=f(x), where both y and x are real numbers.
    functions  
    Functions_GUI  
    Functions_GUITest
    Partial JUnit + main test for the GUI_Functions class, expected output from the main: 0) java.awt.Color[r=0,g=0,b=255] f(x)= plus(-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1,+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0) 1) java.awt.Color[r=0,g=255,b=255] f(x)= plus(div(+1.0x +1.0,mul(mul(+1.0x +3.0,+1.0x -2.0),+1.0x -4.0)),2.0) 2) java.awt.Color[r=255,g=0,b=255] f(x)= div(plus(-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1,+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0),-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1) 3) java.awt.Color[r=255,g=200,b=0] f(x)= -1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1 4) java.awt.Color[r=255,g=0,b=0] f(x)= +0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0 5) java.awt.Color[r=0,g=255,b=0] f(x)= max(max(max(max(plus(-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1,+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0),plus(div(+1.0x +1.0,mul(mul(+1.0x +3.0,+1.0x -2.0),+1.0x -4.0)),2.0)),div(plus(-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1,+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0),-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1)),-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1),+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0) 6) java.awt.Color[r=255,g=175,b=175] f(x)= min(min(min(min(plus(-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1,+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0),plus(div(+1.0x +1.0,mul(mul(+1.0x +3.0,+1.0x -2.0),+1.0x -4.0)),2.0)),div(plus(-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1,+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0),-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1)),-1.0x^4 +2.4x^2 +3.1),+0.1x^5 -1.2999999999999998x +5.0)
    Monom
    This class represents a simple "Monom" of shape a*x^b, where a is a real number and b is an integer (summed a none negative), see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monomial The class implements function and support simple operations as: construction, value at x, derivative, add and multiply.
    Monom_Comperator  
    MonomTest
    This class represents a simple (naive) tester for the Monom class, Note:
    (i) The class is NOT a JUNIT - (i.e., educational reasons) - should be changed to a proper JUnit in Ex1.
    MonomTest  
    Operation
    This enum presents the set of operations applicable on function to compose a complex function from two functions.
    paint  
    Polynom
    This class represents a Polynom with add, multiply functionality, it also should support the following: 1.
    Polynom_able
    This interface represents a general Polynom: f(x) = a_1X^b_1 + a_2*X^b_2 ...

    Range
    This class represents a simple 1D range of shape [min,max]
    StdDraw
